title: Softening into Stillness for Sleep
goal: Calm the nervous system and prepare the body for sleep.

steps.title: Comfortable Lying Down (Savasana Variation)
steps.instructions: Lie on your back with legs extended, arms resting by your side, palms up. Support neck and knees with pillows. Close your eyes and take a gentle sigh.

steps.title: Gentle Sighing Breath
steps.instructions: Inhale gently through the nose. Exhale slowly through the mouth with a soft sigh. Repeat 3â€“5 times, then let the breath return to normal.

steps.title: Gentle Progressive Relaxation (Legs & Hips)
steps.instructions: While lying still, tense and release: feet, calves, thighs, and hips. Inhale to create gentle tension for 2 counts, exhale and release completely. Let your lower body feel heavy and grounded.

steps.title: Counting Backward Breath
steps.instructions: Observe natural breathing. On each exhale, mentally count down from 10 to 1. If distracted, gently return to the last number you remember. Let the breath lull you toward sleep.

title: Peaceful Body Scan for Deep Rest
goal: Release tension and quiet the mind for profound relaxation and sleep.

steps.title: Supported Lying Down (Savasana Variation)
steps.instructions: Lie comfortably in bed with pillows under your knees and neck. Use a blanket for warmth. Let arms relax with palms facing up. Close your eyes and settle in.

steps.title: Smooth Belly Breathing
steps.instructions: Breathe in slowly through the nose, letting your belly rise. Breathe out through the nose, belly softens. Let the breath be smooth and quiet like a wave.

steps.title: Mindful Body Scan (Head to Toes)
steps.instructions: Gently bring your awareness to each part of your body, starting from the forehead, eyes, jaw, neck, shoulders... down to toes. With each out-breath, silently say 'relax' and release tension in that part. Move slowly and stay still.

steps.title: Smooth Belly Breathing
steps.instructions: Breathe in slowly through the nose, letting your belly rise. Breathe out through the nose, belly softens. Let the breath be smooth and quiet like a wave.
